titleproper.value:
Guide to the Michelangelo Signorile Papers 
                    <lb/>
                    <date>ca. 1985-2000 </date>
                    <lb/>
                    <num>MSS 131</num>

author.value: Finding aid prepared by / collection processed by James Pritchard.

creation.value:
This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit
                <date>2014-04-03T16:03-0400</date>

abstract.label: Abstract
abstract.value:
This collection follows the development of Michelangelo Signorile’s writing career from its early stages through the publishing of his most recent book, 
                <title render="italic">Life Outside</title>, and his magazine articles of the late 1990s. From his days at 
                <title render="italic">Outweek</title> magazine forward, the archive documents the life cycle of each of his books and columnist jobs, from initial reporting and research to publicity and fan letters in response to the published work. As an extensive account of Signorile’s career in the late 1980s through the end of the 1990s, the collection serves as an informative chronicle of the gay movement and its increasing recognition and visibility in the United States.

p.value: Most materials are open for research without restrictions, except for Series II, suberies A which contains confidential information about individuals, and Series IV: Legal. Appointments are required to view archival and manuscripts materials at the Fales Library.

Published citations should take the following form:
                <lb/>
                <lb/> Identification of item, date (if known); The Michelangelo Signorile Paper; MSS 131; box number; folder number; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University Libraries.

<list>
                    <item>
                        <title render="italic">Queer in America</title>, New York, NY: Random House, 1993.</item>
                    <item>
                        <title render="italic">Outing Yourself</title>, New York, NY: Random House, 1995.</item>
                    <item>
                        <title render="italic">Life Outside: The Signorile Report on Gay Men: Sex, Drugs, Muscles and the Passages of Life</title>, New York, NY: HarperCollins, 1997.</item>
                </list>

The final series is comprised of all media materials in the collection. Media materials here come in three formats-video tapes, audio tapes, and computer disks. The six video tapes feature Signorile interviews, TV coverage, and a documentary on gay activism. The audio tapes include mostly reporter interviews ranging from 
                <title render="italic">Outweek</title> to 
                <title render="italic">Out. </title>Video and audio materials are organized in the series by approximate date. Computer disks include research articles compiled from electronic research services.
